commands.roll.err.invalid-dice-count: That is not a valid number of dice:
commands.roll.err.invalid-dice: This is not a valid dice:
commands.character.you-are-not-playing-a:
Sorry, you are not playing as anyone.
You can use the JSON Character editor to create you character and send it to the DSA Bot Host to start playing.
Download: https://github.com/gruenwaldlk/dsa_bot/releases
commands.character.could-not-parse-talen: Sorry, I couldn't parse the command. Maybe you mistyped?
commands.meta.help:
**Commands**
```txt
roll         <n>d<m>          Rolls n m-sided dice.
                              Shorthand: r
roll_sum_mod <x>d<y>+|-<z>    Rolls x y-sided dice with an optional modificator z and sums them up.
                              Shorthand: rsm, rsmod, rsummod, roll_sum, rsum, rs
character_info                Tells a player as what character they are playing.
                              Shorthand: char, c
talent_roll <talent>+|-<m>    Performs a talent check with an optional modification m.
                              Shorthand: t
get_ini                       Rolls the character's ini.
                              Shorthand: ini
```
